verses.verse: "Behold,<WH7200> I have called<WH7121> by name<WH8034> Bezalel<WH1212> the son<WH1121> of Uri,<WH221> the son<WH1121> of Hur,<WH2354> of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah:<WH3063>
and I have filled<WH4390> him with the Spirit<WH7307> of God,<WH430> in wisdom,<WH2451> and in understanding,<WH8394> and in knowledge,<WH1847> and in all kinds of workmanship,<WH4399>
to devise<WH2803> skillful works,<WH4284> to work<WH6213> in gold,<WH2091> and in silver,<WH3701> and in brass,<WH5178>
and in cutting<WH2799> of stones<WH68> for setting,<WH4390> and in carving<WH2799> of wood,<WH6086> to work<WH6213> in all kinds of workmanship.<WH4399>

I,<WH5414> behold, I have appointed with him Oholiab,<WH171> the son<WH1121> of Ahisamach,<WH294> of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan;<WH1835> and in the heart<WH3820> of all who are<WH2450> wise-hearted<WH3820> I have put<WH5414> wisdom,<WH2451> that they may make<WH6213> all that I have commanded you:<WH6680>
the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> the ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715> the mercy seat<WH3727> that is on it,<WH3627> all the furniture of the Tent,<WH168>
the table<WH7979> and its vessels,<WH3627> the pure<WH2889> lampstand<WH4501> with all its vessels,<WH3627> the altar<WH4196> of incense,<WH7004>
the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering<WH5930> with all its vessels,<WH3627> the basin<WH3595> and its base,<WH3653>
the finely worked<WH8278> garments<WH899>—the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>—the garments<WH899> of his sons<WH1121> to minister in the priest<WH3547>'s office,
the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and the incense<WH7004> of sweet<WH5561> spices for the holy<WH6944> place:<WH6680> according to all that I have commanded you they shall do.<WH6213>"

"Speak<WH1696> also to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> <WH389> 'Most certainly you shall keep<WH8104> my Sabbaths:<WH7676> for it is a sign<WH226> between me and you throughout your generations;<WH1755> that you may know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh<WH3068> who sanctifies you.<WH6942>

You shall keep<WH8104> the Sabbath<WH7676> therefore;<WH6944> for it is holy to you.<WH2490> Everyone who profanes it shall surely<WH4191> be put to death;<WH4191> for whoever does<WH6213> any work<WH4399> therein,<WH5315> that soul shall be cut off<WH3772> from among<WH7130> his people.<WH5971>

Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> shall work<WH4399> be done,<WH6213> but on the seventh<WH7637> day is a Sabbath<WH7676> of solemn rest,<WH7677> holy<WH6944> to Yahweh.<WH3068> Whoever does<WH6213> any work<WH4399> on the Sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death.<WH4191>

Therefore the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall keep<WH8104> the Sabbath,<WH7676> to observe<WH6213> the Sabbath<WH7676> throughout their generations,<WH1755> for a perpetual<WH5769> covenant.<WH1285>

It is a sign<WH226> between me and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> forever;<WH5769> for in six<WH8337> days<WH3117> Yahweh<WH3068> made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth,<WH776> and on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> he rested,<WH7673> and was refreshed.<WH5314>'"

He gave<WH5414> to Moses,<WH4872> when he finished<WH3615> speaking<WH1696> with him on Mount<WH2022> Sinai,<WH5514> the two<WH8147> tablets<WH3871> of the testimony,<WH5715> stone<WH68> tablets,<WH3871> written<WH3789> with God<WH430>'s finger.<WH676>
